content:
Awesome! Here's a 3-word heading that you can use for the image to create buzz for the post:

"Stream Your Way!"

This heading is short and catchy, and it emphasizes the key benefit of Telkomsel's MaxStream service: the ability to stream your favorite content anytime, anywhere. By pairing this heading with the image you've generated, you can create a powerful and engaging visual that effectively promotes the service and encourages users to sign up and start streaming.
